memberdef.name: AT_EXECFD
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* File descriptor of program to load. */

memberdef.name: AT_PHDR
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* Program header of program already loaded. */

memberdef.name: AT_PHENT
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* Size of each program header entry. */

inbodydescription.para: Clean the virtual of COW pages left over from the fork
Clean the virtual of COW pages left over from the fork
